Actions.Name: Agent Campaign Access
Actions.Description: This operation edits an agent's campaign access rights.

Actions.Name: Create an Agent
Actions.Description: This operation creates a new agent.

Actions.Name: Create a Callback
Actions.Description: This operation creates a new public or private callback.

Actions.Name: Create a Contact
Actions.Description: This operation creates a new contact in a calling list.

Actions.Name: Find an Agent
Actions.Description: This operation finds an agent's name and ID based on their username.

Actions.Name: Find a Contact
Actions.Description: This operation gets a list of contact IDs fitting the given information.

Actions.Name: Modify an Agent
Actions.Description: This operation edits an agent's personal and work related information.

Actions.Name: Modify a Contact
Actions.Description: This operation edits a contact's information.
